entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
